attributes.action: Stop Charging Nurses Hospital Parking Fees
attributes.additional_details:
The government need to step in and abolish parking charges for NHS staff.  Without our nurses we wouldn’t have an NHS. Nurses have to work nights/shifts/unsociable hours and driving to work is often the only way to get to work.

Pleas support this petition and stop hospitals charging our nurses for parking at work. Thank you.
attributes.background: I was shocked to find out nurses and others who work in hospital have high monthly parking charges deducted automatically from their wages.  The nurse I know who only had 3 days holiday during the whole of 2020 has £30 deducted from her wage every month just to park near work.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for very similar actions: 

Make parking at work permanently free for all NHS workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612699

Fund free NHS parking permits for student nurses and midwives: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618942
